ShoppedGuiHelper _shoppedGuiHelper

Detailed Description

The class that loads, runs and handles events of the Shopped main GUI.

Parameters:
_shoppedGuiHelper An instance of the ShoppedGuiHelper class.

EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Handles the event of clicking Help->About menu item. Displays message box containing information about Shopped (developer names, program info).

void UI::ShoppedGui::EnableGuiItems (  )  [inline]

Called upon once an image is loaded from file, this enables the features/options that can now be used.

EventArgs  e

Initial loading of the Shopped program. Disables certain features/options that should not be available until an image is loaded into the program.

void UI::ShoppedGui::resizeToolStripMenuItem_Click ( object  sender,
EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Handles the event of clicking the Tools->Resize menu item. Displays the ResizeDialog windows form, obtains the value to resize from the form, then resizes the image according to the resize value.

void UI::ShoppedGui::rotateToolStripMenuItem_Click ( object  sender,
EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Handles the event of clicking the Tools->Rotate menu item. Displays the RotateDialog windows form, obtains the value to rotate from the form, then rotates the image according to the rotate value.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetAdditionalInfo (  )  [inline]

Sets the information about the PictureBox image that is located at the bottom of the Shopped GUI. Information includes height, width and the name of the image.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetPictureBoxOnUndoOrRedo ( Image  image  )  [inline]

Given an Image object from the ImageHistory class, set the ShoppedGUI PictureBox (image being currently displayed) to that Image object.

TODO: Change Image object to PictureBoxImage object.

Parameters:
image The image from the ImageHistory class.
void UI::ShoppedGui::SetUndoAndRedo (  )  [inline, private]

Called upon when the event of clicking Undo/Redo in the Shopped GUI, this will enable or disable the Undo/Redo buttons and menu items in the GUI. This will also set the tooltip text for the undo/redo GUI items.

void UI::ShoppedGui::undoToolStripMenuItem_Click ( object  sender,

) [inline, private]

string  operation 
) [inline]

Sets the PictureBox to the image passed to this method.

Parameters:
image The image to set the PictureBox to.
operation A brief description of the operation just performed to the Shopped GUI image.
void UI::ShoppedGui::zoomImageToolStripMenuItem_Click ( object  sender,
EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Handles the event of clicking the View->Zoom Image menu item. Displays the ZoomDialog windows form, obtains the value to zoom from the form, then zooms the image according to the zoom value.
